document_data.name: Refuse Pit
document_data.mainbody: The '''refuse pit''' of [[Port Nyanzaru]], [[Chult]] was the city's garbage dump.
document_data.History:
As of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], the refuse pit had gained an unfortunate reputation as a place where corpses were dumped, providing a steady food supply for the undead.{{Cite adventurers league/Fester and Burn|4-5}} 

Following the end of the [[death curse]], a [[wight]] [[necromancer]] named [[Jaru Tasca]] acquired a piece of the [[Cyst]], a powerful [[necromantic]] mass of flesh, and plotted to use it to transform Port Nyanzaru's residents into undead. Her minions would rise from the refuse pit to capture victims and return them to her secret base in the catacombs beneath the Old City.{{Cite adventurers league/Fester and Burn|3}} The number of undead in the pit soon grew and began to threaten the city.{{Cite adventurers league/Putting the Dead to Rest|3}}
